parameters.name: ApplicationName
parameters.description: The name of the application. Only fuzzy match from the leftmost character is supported.

parameters.name: AuthorizationType
parameters.description:
The authorization of the application. Valid values:

*   authorize_required: Only the user with explicit authorization can access the application.
*   default_all: By default, all users can access the application.

parameters.name: M2MClientStatus
parameters.description:
Used to determine whether M2M client identity is enabled.
- enabled
- disabled

parameters.name: PageNumber
parameters.description: The number of the page to return.

parameters.name: PageSize
parameters.description: The number of entries to return on each page.

parameters.name: ResourceServerStatus
parameters.description:
Used to determine whether the ResourceServer capability is enabled.
- enabled
- disabled

parameters.name: Status
parameters.description:
The status of the application. Valid values:

*   Enabled: The application is enabled.
*   Disabled: The application is disabled.
